121 #define HWPL_CFG_SIZE_MAX 32
122 
127 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
128  device_periph_t periph ;
129  uint8_t pin_assign ;
130  uint32_t bitrate ;
131  union {
132  device_spi_cfg_t spi ;
133  device_pwm_cfg_t pwm ;
134  device_adc_cfg_t adc ;
135  device_uart_cfg_t uart ;
136  device_i2c_cfg_t i2c ;
137  pio_t pio[4] ;
138  } pcfg;
139  const void * dcfg ;
140  void * state ;
141 } device_cfg_t;
142 
143 
148 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
149  int tid ;
150  int flags ;
151  int loc ;
152  union {
153  const void * cbuf ;
154  void * buf ;
155  const char * cchbuf ;
156  char * chbuf ;
157  };
158  int nbyte ;
159  hwpl_callback_t callback ;
160  void * context ;
161 } device_transfer_t;
162 
163 typedef int (*device_driver_open_t)(const device_cfg_t*);
164 typedef int (*device_driver_ioctl_t)(const device_cfg_t*, int, void*);
165 typedef int (*device_driver_read_t)(const device_cfg_t*, device_transfer_t *);
166 typedef int (*device_driver_write_t)(const device_cfg_t*, device_transfer_t *);
167 typedef int (*device_driver_close_t)(const device_cfg_t*);
168 
177 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
178  device_driver_open_t open ;
179  device_driver_ioctl_t ioctl ;
180  device_driver_read_t read ;
181  device_driver_write_t write ;
182  device_driver_close_t close ;
183 } device_driver_t;
184 
189 typedef struct {
190  char name[NAME_MAX] ;
191  uint8_t uid ;
192  uint8_t gid ;
193  uint16_t mode ;
194  device_driver_t driver ;
195  device_cfg_t cfg ;
196 } device_t;
197 
198 
199 #define DEVICE_MODE(mode_value, uid_value, gid_value, type) .mode = mode_value | type, \
200  .uid = uid_value, \
201  .gid = gid_value
202 
203 #define DEVICE_DRIVER(driver_name) .driver.open = driver_name##_open, \
204  .driver.close = driver_name##_close, \
205  .driver.ioctl = driver_name##_ioctl, \
206  .driver.read = driver_name##_read, \
207  .driver.write = driver_name##_write
208 
220 #define DEVICE_PERIPH(device_name, periph_name, port_number, mode_value, uid_value, gid_value, device_type) { \
221  .name = device_name, \
222  DEVICE_MODE(mode_value, uid_value, gid_value, device_type), \
223  DEVICE_DRIVER(periph_name), \
224  .cfg.periph.port = port_number \
225 }
226 
227 #define DEVICE_TERMINATOR { \
228  .driver.open = NULL \
229 }
230 
231 #ifndef __link
232 
233 static inline bool device_is_terminator(const device_t * dev);
234 bool device_is_terminator(const device_t * dev){
235  if ( dev->driver.open == NULL ){
236  return true;
237  }
238  return false;
239 }
240 #endif
